Getting started with sphinx
  • Adding and subtracting numbers
  • View page source

Adding and subtracting numbers

add_subtract.add(a, b)

Add two numbers.

Parameters

afloat

The first number.

bfloat

The second number.

Returns

float

The sum of the two numbers.

Examples

>>> add(2, 3)
5
add_subtract.subtract(a, b)

Subtract one number from another.

Parameters

afloat

The number to subtract from.

bfloat

The number to subtract.

Returns

float

The result of the subtraction.

Examples

>>> subtract(5, 3)
2

Multiplying and dividing numbers

multiply_divide.divide(a, b)

Divide one number by another.

Parameters

afloat

The numerator.

bfloat

The denominator.

Returns

float

The result of the division.

Raises

ZeroDivisionError

If b is zero.

Examples

>>> divide(10, 2)
5.0
multiply_divide.multiply(a, b)

Multiply two numbers.

Parameters

afloat

The first number.

bfloat

The second number.

Returns

float

The product of the two numbers.

Examples

>>> multiply(4, 3)
12
